42 SurfaceSkdTree::SurfaceSkdTree(const SurfaceKernel *patch, bool interiorCellsOnly)
43  : PatchSkdTree(patch, interiorCellsOnly)

45 }

53 void SurfaceSkdTree::clear(bool release)
54 {
55  if (release) {
56  std::vector<std::size_t>().swap(m_nodeStack);
57  std::vector<std::size_t>().swap(m_candidateIds);
58  std::vector<double>().swap(m_candidateMinDistances);
59  }
60 
61  PatchSkdTree::clear(release);
62 }
63 
73 double SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
74 {
75  return evalPointDistance(point, std::numeric_limits<double>::max(), false);
76 }
77 
94 double SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(const std::array<double, 3> &point, double maxDistance) const
95 {
96  return evalPointDistance(point, maxDistance, false);
97 }
98 
118 double SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(const std::array<double, 3> &point, double maxDistance, bool interiorCellsOnly) const
119 {
120  long id;
121  double distance = maxDistance;
122 
123  findPointClosestCell(point, interiorCellsOnly, &id, &distance);
124 
125  return distance;
126 }
127 
138 void SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, double *distances) const
139 {
140  std::vector<double> maxDistances(nPoints, std::numeric_limits<double>::max());
141 
142  evalPointDistance(nPoints, points, maxDistances.data(), false, distances);
143 }

211 void SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointDistance(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, const double *maxDistances, bool interiorCellsOnly, double *distances) const
212 {
213  std::vector<long> ids(nPoints, Cell::NULL_ID);
214 
215  findPointClosestCell(nPoints, points, maxDistances, interiorCellsOnly, ids.data(), distances);
216 }

280 void SurfaceSkdTree::evalPointGlobalDistance(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, const double *maxDistances, double *distances) const
281 {
282  std::vector<long> ids(nPoints, Cell::NULL_ID);
283  std::vector<int> ranks(nPoints, -1);
284 
285  findPointClosestGlobalCell(nPoints, points, maxDistances, ids.data(), ranks.data(), distances);
286 }

304 long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(const std::array<double, 3> &point, long *id, double *distance) const
305 {
306  return findPointClosestCell(point, std::numeric_limits<double>::max(), false, id, distance);
307 }
308 
326 long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(const std::array<double, 3> &point, double maxDistance,
327  long *id, double *distance) const
328 {
329  return findPointClosestCell(point, maxDistance, false, id, distance);
330 }
331 
352 long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(const std::array<double, 3> &point, double maxDistance,
353  bool interiorCellsOnly, long *id, double *distance) const
354 {
355  // Initialize the cell id
356  *id = Cell::NULL_ID;
357 
358  // Initialize the distance with an estimate
359  //
360  // The real distance will be lesser than or equal to the estimate.
361  std::size_t rootId = 0;
362  const SkdNode &root = m_nodes[rootId];
363  *distance = std::min(root.evalPointMaxDistance(point), maxDistance);
364 
365  // Get a list of candidates nodes
366  //
367  // Some temporary data structures are memeber of the class to avoid
368  // their reallocation every time the function is called.
369  m_nodeStack.clear();
370  m_candidateIds.clear();
371  m_candidateMinDistances.clear();
372 
373  m_nodeStack.push_back(rootId);
374  while (!m_nodeStack.empty()) {
375  std::size_t nodeId = m_nodeStack.back();
376  const SkdNode &node = m_nodes[nodeId];
377  m_nodeStack.pop_back();
378 
379  // Do not consider nodes with a minimum distance greater than
380  // the distance estimate
381  double nodeMinDistance = node.evalPointMinDistance(point);
382  if (nodeMinDistance > *distance) {
383  continue;
384  }
385 
386  // Update the distance estimate
387  //
388  // The real distance will be lesser than or equal to the
389  // estimate.
390  double nodeMaxDistance = node.evalPointMaxDistance(point);
391  *distance = std::min(nodeMaxDistance, *distance);
392 
393  // If the node is a leaf add it to the candidates, otherwise
394  // add its children to the stack.
395  bool isLeaf = true;
396  for (int i = SkdNode::CHILD_BEGIN; i != SkdNode::CHILD_END; ++i) {
397  SkdNode::ChildLocation childLocation = static_cast<SkdNode::ChildLocation>(i);
398  std::size_t childId = node.getChildId(childLocation);
399  if (childId != SkdNode::NULL_ID) {
400  isLeaf = false;
401  m_nodeStack.push_back(childId);
402  }
403  }
404 
405  if (isLeaf) {
406  m_candidateIds.push_back(nodeId);
407  m_candidateMinDistances.push_back(nodeMinDistance);
408  }
409  }
410 
411  // Process the candidates and find the closest cell
412  long nDistanceEvaluations = 0;
413  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < m_candidateIds.size(); ++k) {
414  // Do not consider nodes with a minimum distance greater than
415  // the distance estimate
416  if (m_candidateMinDistances[k] > *distance) {
417  continue;
418  }
419 
420  // Evaluate the distance
421  std::size_t nodeId = m_candidateIds[k];
422  const SkdNode &node = m_nodes[nodeId];
423 
424  node.updatePointClosestCell(point, interiorCellsOnly, id, distance);
425  ++nDistanceEvaluations;
426  }
427 
428  // If no closest cell was found set the distance to the maximum
429  // representable distance.
430  if (*id == Cell::NULL_ID) {
431  *distance = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
432  }
433 
434  return nDistanceEvaluations;
435 }
436 
448 long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, long *ids, double *distances) const
449 {
450  long nDistanceEvaluations = 0;
451  for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i) {
452  nDistanceEvaluations += findPointClosestCell(points[i], std::numeric_limits<double>::max(), false, ids + i, distances + i);
453  }
454 
455  return nDistanceEvaluations;
456 }
457

475 {
476  long nDistanceEvaluations = 0;
477  for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i) {
478  nDistanceEvaluations += findPointClosestCell(points[i], maxDistance, false, ids + i, distances + i);
479  }
480

482 }

525 long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestCell(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, const double *maxDistances, bool interiorCellsOnly, long *ids, double *distances) const
526 {
527  long nDistanceEvaluations = 0;
528  for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i) {
529  nDistanceEvaluations += findPointClosestCell(points[i], maxDistances[i], interiorCellsOnly, ids + i, distances + i);
530  }
531 
532  return nDistanceEvaluations;
533 }

576  long *ids, int *ranks, double *distances) const

579

581 }
582 
603 long SurfaceSkdTree::findPointClosestGlobalCell(int nPoints, const std::array<double, 3> *points, const double *maxDistances,
604  long *ids, int *ranks, double *distances) const
605 {
606  long nDistanceEvaluations = 0;
607 
608  // Early return is the patch is not partitioned
609  const PatchKernel &patch = getPatch();
610  if (!patch.isPartitioned()) {
611  for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i) {
612  // Evaluate distance
613  nDistanceEvaluations += findPointClosestCell(points[i], maxDistances[i], ids + i, distances + i);
614 
615  // The patch is not partitioned, all cells are local
616  ranks[i] = patch.getRank();
617  }
618 
619  return nDistanceEvaluations;
620  }
621 
622  // Get MPI communicator
623  if (!isCommunicatorSet()) {
624  throw std::runtime_error("Skd-tree communicator has not been set.");
625  }
626 
627  MPI_Comm communicator = getCommunicator();
628 
629  // Gather the number of points associated to each process
630  std::vector<int> pointsCount(m_nProcessors);
631  MPI_Allgather(&nPoints, 1, MPI_INT, pointsCount.data(), 1, MPI_INT, communicator);
632 
633  // Evaluate information for data communications
634  std::vector<int> globalPointsDispls(m_nProcessors, 0);
635  std::vector<int> globalPointsOffsets(m_nProcessors, 0);
636  std::vector<int> globalPointsDataCount(m_nProcessors, 0);
637 
638  globalPointsDataCount[0] = 3 * pointsCount[0];
639  for (int i = 1; i < m_nProcessors; ++i) {
640  globalPointsDispls[i] = globalPointsDispls[i - 1] + 3 * pointsCount[i - 1];
641  globalPointsOffsets[i] = globalPointsOffsets[i - 1] + pointsCount[i - 1];
642  globalPointsDataCount[i] = 3 * pointsCount[i];
643  }
644 
645  int nGlobalPoints = globalPointsDispls.back() + pointsCount.back();
646 
647  // Gather point coordinates
648  std::vector<std::array<double,3>> globalPoints(nGlobalPoints);
649  int pointsDataCount = 3 * nPoints;
650  MPI_Allgatherv(points, pointsDataCount, MPI_DOUBLE, globalPoints.data(),
651  globalPointsDataCount.data(), globalPointsDispls.data(), MPI_DOUBLE, communicator);
652 
653  // Gather vector with all maximum distances
654  std::vector<double> globalMaxDistances(nGlobalPoints);
655  MPI_Allgatherv(maxDistances, nPoints, MPI_DOUBLE, globalMaxDistances.data(),
656  pointsCount.data(), globalPointsOffsets.data(), MPI_DOUBLE, communicator);
657 
658  // Initialize distance information
659  std::vector<SkdGlobalCellDistance> globalCellDistances(nGlobalPoints);
660 
661  // Call local find point closest cell for each global point collected
662  for (int i = 0; i < nGlobalPoints; ++i) {
663  // Get point information
664  const std::array<double, 3> &point = globalPoints[i];
665 
666  // Use a maximum distance for each point given by an estimation
667  // based on partition bounding boxes. The distance will be lesser
668  // than or equal to the point maximum distance.
669  double pointMaxDistance = globalMaxDistances[i];
670  for (int rank = 0; rank < m_nProcessors; ++rank) {
671  pointMaxDistance = std::min(getPartitionBox(rank).evalPointMaxDistance(point), pointMaxDistance);
672  }
673 
674  // Get cell distance information
675  SkdGlobalCellDistance &globalCellDistance = globalCellDistances[i];
676  int &cellRank = globalCellDistance.getRank();
677  long &cellId = globalCellDistance.getId();
678  double &cellDistance = globalCellDistance.getDistance();
679 
680  // Evaluate local distance from the point
681  bool interiorCellsOnly = true;
682  nDistanceEvaluations += findPointClosestCell(point, pointMaxDistance, interiorCellsOnly, &cellId, &cellDistance);
683 
684  // Set cell rank
685  if (cellId != Cell::NULL_ID) {
686  cellRank = patch.getCellRank(cellId);
687  }
688  }
689 
690  // Exchange distance information
691  MPI_Datatype globalCellDistanceDatatype = SkdGlobalCellDistance::getMPIDatatype();
692  MPI_Op globalCellDistanceMinOp = SkdGlobalCellDistance::getMPIMinOperation();
693  for (int rank = 0; rank < m_nProcessors; ++rank) {
694  SkdGlobalCellDistance *globalCellDistance = globalCellDistances.data() + globalPointsOffsets[rank];
695  if (m_rank == rank) {
696  MPI_Reduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, globalCellDistance, pointsCount[rank], globalCellDistanceDatatype, globalCellDistanceMinOp, rank, communicator);
697  } else {
698  MPI_Reduce(globalCellDistance, globalCellDistance, pointsCount[rank], globalCellDistanceDatatype, globalCellDistanceMinOp, rank, communicator);
699  }
700  }
701 
702  // Update output arguments
703  for (int i = 0; i < nPoints; ++i) {
704  int globalIndex = i + globalPointsOffsets[m_rank];
705  SkdGlobalCellDistance &globalCellDistance = globalCellDistances[globalIndex];
706  globalCellDistance.exportData(ranks + i, ids + i, distances + i);
707  }
708 
709  return nDistanceEvaluations;
710 }
711 #endif
712 
713 }
